location.data.labyrinth.name: Labyrinth
location.data.labyrinth.reward.name: Labyrinth Loot
location.data.labyrinth.paths.title: Labyrinth Paths
location.data.labyrinth.effect.enter: You may <style="status">Enter</style> the Labyrinth by selecting one of the open <style="value">Paths</style>. Each path leads to a <style="status">Battle</style>. The best Loot is found at the depth of the Labyrinth.
location.data.labyrinth.effect.conquered: Once you <style="status">Conquered</style> a path, you cannot re-enter the Labyrinth.
location.data.labyrinth.effect.unit_rest: Only <style="value">1</style> <style="wound">Non-Wounded</style>, <style="status">Non-Exhausted</style> Followers may Enter the Labyrinth with the player.
location.data.labyrinth.battle.title: Labyrinth Dwellers
location.data.labyrinth.battle.subtitle: Enter to Battle
location.data.labyrinth.enter.label: Enter
location.data.labyrinth.conquered.label: Conquered
location.data.labyrinth.path.0.name: Lair
location.data.labyrinth.path.1.name: Pit
location.data.labyrinth.path.2.name: Abyss
